execution.query: SELECT [Measures].[Reseller Order Count] ON 0, EXCEPT({[Date].[Calendar Year].Children},{[Date].[Calendar Year].[CY 2006]}) ON 1 FROM [Adventure Works]

equalTo.query: SELECT 'CY 2001', 366 UNION ALL SELECT 'CY 2002', 1015 UNION ALL SELECT 'CY 2003', 1521 UNION ALL SELECT 'CY 2004', 894
